article_text: Bill Cobb, Block’s chief executive officer, said he is happier with the Kansas City company’s numbers financially. The company is succeeding in its strategy of earning more revenue per customer, partly through price increases but also by providing additional services.

article_metadata.news-keywords: tax, filing, h&r block, block, earnings

article_summary:
Bill Cobb, Block’s chief executive officer, said he is happier with the Kansas City company’s numbers financially.
The company is succeeding in its strategy of earning more revenue per customer, partly through price increases but also by providing additional services.
